page.title: 07The Crown and Mitre
page.content: The Crown and Mitre is a friendly pub. It is not very large and is situated in New Smithy. It is the sort of place you can take your family to and you can meet your friends, or you can go there for some peace and quiet by yourself. The atmosphere of the Crown and Mitre is very friendly and jolly. It sort of reflects Chinley village, because everybody seems to know each other and get on well. The front and the back of the building are completely different, because at the front there is the busyness of Hayfield Road and at the back there is the quietness and calmness of the hamlet of New Smithy. The Crown and Mitre is run by Mr and Mrs Hall, who have been the landlord and landlady for some years now. by {Rhian Leyland
